query:
SELECT 
  DATE(consumptionDate) as date,
  COUNT(*) as entries,
  SUM(CAST(quantity AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as total_quantity
FROM consumption c
JOIN products p ON c.productId = p.id
WHERE p.name = 'Brobergs Arcadia'
GROUP BY DATE(consumptionDate)
ORDER BY date;

  COUNT(*) as entries,
  SUM(CAST(quantity AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as total_quantity
FROM consumption c

WHERE p.name = 'Brobergs Arcadia'
GROUP BY DATE(consumptionDate)
ORDER BY date;
